statements: SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_name = 'Ad 1';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 1000 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 3;
SELECT ad_id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id > 5;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 100 ORDER BY ad_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_name, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 0;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY clicks ASC, ad_name;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, impressions * clicks AS total_views FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions > 0 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, impressions, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget >= 500.50 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id > 100 AND budget >= 500.00;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE ad_name LIKE 'Ad%';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE status='active'
SELECT client_name, industry FROM ad_clients ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000
SELECT ad_name, impressions, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impressions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, status, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT client_name, industry FROM ad_clients WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, conversions FROM ad_performance_metrics WHERE conversions >= 5 ORDER BY ad_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget, status FROM ad_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ads;
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_clicks > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_impressions FROM Ads ORDER BY ad_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_id, click_timestamp, device_type FROM AdClicks WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT ad_name, ad_clicks, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_campaign_id = 3;
SELECT ad_name, ad_impressions FROM Ads WHERE ad_cost > 100.00;
SELECT DISTINCT ad_id, ad_clicks, ad_cost FROM Ads WHERE ad_clicks > 500;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_campaign_budget DESC;
SELECT ad_name, click_timestamp, device_type FROM Ads INNER JOIN AdClicks ON Ads.ad_id = AdClicks.ad_id WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT group_id, group_name, bid_amount FROM ad_groups ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT ad_id, impressions, cost FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 1000;
SELECT keyword_name, target_name FROM ad_keywords k INNER JOIN ad_targets t ON k.group_id = t.ad_id WHERE k.keyword_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT group_name, bid_amount FROM ad_groups ORDER BY bid_amount DESC;
SELECT keyword_name, group_id FROM ad_keywords WHERE group_id = 3;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 1000;
